successes.title: NudeAudio Super-M
successes.description: Super-high performance Bluetooth speaker; waterproof & sand proof, that fits in your jeans pocket - minus all the stuff you don't need.

Pledges.description: Love and Good Karma! Join the mission and keep up-to-date with campaign updates, news and special offers
Limited Edition NudeAudio T-Shirt, only 250 to be made. Designed by Peter and shipped worldwide

Friends & Family and Super Early Fan. Get a Super-M from the first batch of ANY colour or ANY Special Edition, free shipping worldwide (see Disclaimer below for exclusions). Be quick these are limited and won't last long!

Early Bird. Get a Super-M from the first batch of ANY colour or ANY Special Edition, free shipping worldwide (see Disclaimer below for exclusions). Thanks for your early support, please share with your friends before they run out!
Super-M Fair Price deal. Get a Super-M from the first batch of ANY colour or ANY Special Edition, free shipping worldwide (see Disclaimer below for exclusions).
The Standard Limited Edition in Nude. Only 100 exclusive pledges (early bird backers can select this option later). Free worldwide shipping.

'NEW! $25 Bike Mount Bundle. Get a Super-M from the first batch of ANY color and ANY Special Edition, plus the Bike Mount. PLEASE SWITCH FROM THE $139 reward.'
free shipping worldwide
NEW! Super-M + Bike Mount Bundle. Get a Super-M from the first batch of ANY colour or ANY Special Edition, plus our Polished Spring Steel Bike Mount, free shipping worldwide
David Shillinglaw Limited Edition Super-M, hand painted, plus 'Kingless Kingdom' Limited Edition Print (1 of 100). Free Worldwide Shipping. EXISTING BACKERS PLEASE SEE FAQ.
3-Pack. Get 3 Super-M in any combination of colours & Special Editions. (No Limited editions, sorry). Free shipping worldwide. (equivalent to $90 per unit)
6-Pack. Get 6 Super-M in any combination of colours & Special Editions. (No Limited editions, sorry). Free shipping worldwide. (equivalent to $83 per unit)

Early Holiday Special Select 10 units in any combination of Black, Fall colours, and Special Editions and share Super-M with your Friends and Family this Christmas. Beats waiting for Black Friday deals and saves $200 on our regular Kickstarter price. Free shipping worldwide (see Disclaimer below for exclusions).

Design your own colourway (pick a pantone for Silicon, Grille, Logo and Cord). Get the only 5 units in the world of your custom design. (will take 60 days longer than other pledges, great for XMAS gifts. Free shipping worldwide (see Disclaimer below for exclusions).. Plus free Black Super-M to get you started

Corporate Gift Pack. Get 10 units of Super-M in any of our colours, with a special silkscreen of your logo and message printed on the base. Great for corporate gifts or personalised gifting. Free shipping worldwide (see Disclaimer below for exclusions).

Behind the scenes Masterclass. Get a 2-day session in London, San Francisco or Hong Kong with serial hardware entrepreneur Tom Dudderidge, NudeAudio's CEO, where he'll teach you anything he knows about hardware start-ups, technology, retail, legal and commercial issues and help you realise your own personal goals. Super-M in any colour included! (Travel and accommodation not included)

Behind the Scenes Masterclass. Get a 2-day session in San Francisco with Peter Riering-Czekalla, NudeAudio's Chief Creative Officer where he will work together with you on your project, teach you about the design process and strategy, and help you realise your own design project. Super-M in any colour included. (Travel and accommodation not included)

Behind the Scenes Masterclass. Get a 2-day session in Hong Kong and/or China with James Myring, NudeAudio's HK-based COO, and learn everything you need to know about China sourcing, managing projects with partner factories, and getting your product into production quickly and competitively. James has lived and worked in China for 10-years and has produced Billions of Dollars of product and delivered 1000's of projects. Super-M in any colour included. (Travel and accommodation not included)
